en.title: FusionExcel At ECoP Conference (Employers Confederation Of Philippines), 14th May 2008. ECoP President Sergio Ortiz-Luis JR Is A Quantem Pendants Wearer. Sergio Ortiz Is Also The Chairman/Treasurer Of The Philippines Chamber Of Commerce & Industry.
en.content:
Chairman Sergio Ortiz (left) with Jeremy Looi, FE's Philippines Country Licensee.
 
Sergio Ortiz-Luis JR with President Arroyo, Philippines.
 
Doing Demos with Senator Joey Lina. 
Senator Joey Lina is the President of Manila Hotel.
 
Doing Demos with Benjamin Loong - Chairman, 
BIMP-EAGA.
 
 
 
Jocelyn Santa Teresa, Representative of Las Pinas City Chamber of Commerce & Industry, now a 
user of aLL FusionExcel products.
